industrial_chic.name: Industrial Chic Bedroom
industrial_chic.description: Raw sophistication with exposed elements and modern comfort
industrial_chic.flooring: Polished concrete or industrial wood with metal accents
industrial_chic.walls: Exposed brick or textured grey concrete effect with metal finishes
industrial_chic.ceiling: Open beam design with exposed ductwork and metal pipes
industrial_chic.lighting: Edison bulb fixtures, track lights, metal pendant lamps
industrial_chic.furniture: Metal frame bed, steel storage units, leather upholstery
industrial_chic.decor: Vintage industrial pieces, metal wall art, leather accents, distressed finishes
industrial_chic.prompt_keywords: industrial chic bedroom, exposed brick, metal accents, Edison bulbs, concrete floors, vintage industrial, raw and edgy, urban modern

japandi_fusion.name: Japandi Fusion Bedroom
japandi_fusion.description: Blending Japanese minimalism with Scandinavian warmth and functionality
japandi_fusion.flooring: Natural light oak or bamboo flooring with subtle texture
japandi_fusion.walls: Soft neutral tones with natural linen or paper-textured wallpaper
japandi_fusion.ceiling: Minimalist flat ceiling with natural wood beams
japandi_fusion.lighting: Soft diffused lighting, paper lanterns, warm ambient LED strips
japandi_fusion.furniture: Low platform bed, natural wood storage, woven baskets
japandi_fusion.decor: Indoor plants, natural fibers, simple ikebana arrangements, zen garden elements
japandi_fusion.prompt_keywords: japandi bedroom, minimalist design, natural materials, low platform bed, warm neutral tones, zen-inspired, cozy minimalism

maximalist_bold.name: Maximalist Bold Bedroom
maximalist_bold.description: Vibrant, pattern-rich space celebrating color and personality
maximalist_bold.flooring: Patterned tiles or bold geometric carpet with mixed textures
maximalist_bold.walls: Multi-colored wallpaper, mixed patterns, or jewel-tone painted accent walls
maximalist_bold.ceiling: Feature ceiling with bold color or patterned wallpaper
maximalist_bold.lighting: Chandelier, colored pendant lights, neon accents, layered lighting
maximalist_bold.furniture: Ornate bed frame, colorful upholstered pieces, statement furniture
maximalist_bold.decor: Abundant artwork, decorative mirrors, sculptures, layered textiles, vintage collectibles
maximalist_bold.prompt_keywords: maximalist bedroom, bold colors, mixed patterns, colorful furniture, eclectic decor, vibrant atmosphere, personality-driven design

coastal_serene.name: Coastal Serene Bedroom
coastal_serene.description: Beach-inspired tranquility with natural textures and ocean vibes
coastal_serene.flooring: Light sand-colored tiles or whitewashed wooden floors
coastal_serene.walls: Soft whites, light blues, or sandy beige with coastal patterns
coastal_serene.ceiling: Whitewashed wood paneling or light plaster ceiling
coastal_serene.lighting: Soft natural light, rattan pendant lights, coastal-themed wall sconces

coastal_serene.decor: Seashells, coral decorations, ocean-themed artwork, nautical textiles, rope details
coastal_serene.prompt_keywords: coastal bedroom, beach-inspired, light blues and whites, natural textures, seafaring decor, nautical theme, calm seaside atmosphere

art_deco_glamour.name: Art Deco Glamour Bedroom

art_deco_glamour.walls: Deep jewel-toned walls with gold geometric wallpaper or panels
art_deco_glamour.ceiling: Coffered ceiling with gold accents and decorative molding
art_deco_glamour.lighting: Brass chandeliers, geometric wall sconces, crystal pendant lights

rustic_farmhouse.name: Rustic Farmhouse Bedroom
rustic_farmhouse.description: Warm country charm with authentic rural simplicity and comfort
rustic_farmhouse.flooring: Reclaimed wood flooring or distressed wooden planks
rustic_farmhouse.walls: Shiplap walls, whitewashed wood paneling, or soft earth-tone paint
rustic_farmhouse.ceiling: Exposed wooden beams or rustic timber ceiling
rustic_farmhouse.lighting: Vintage lantern lights, wrought iron fixtures, warm bulb lighting

rustic_farmhouse.decor: Vintage quilts, barn door accents, galvanized metal decor, antique farmhouse accessories

modern_tech_smart.name: Modern Tech-Smart Bedroom
modern_tech_smart.description: Contemporary design integrated with smart home technology and automation
modern_tech_smart.flooring: Polished concrete with smart heating or light wood with tech integration
modern_tech_smart.walls: Matte black or white walls with integrated smart panels
modern_tech_smart.ceiling: Flat ceiling with hidden smart lighting system and voice control
modern_tech_smart.lighting: Smart LED system with color-changing capabilities, motion-sensor lights

modern_tech_smart.decor: Minimalist tech decor, smart mirrors, digital art displays, clean technology elements

minimalist_zen.walls: Off-white, soft grey, or pale sage green with zero decorations
minimalist_zen.ceiling: Simple flat ceiling with minimal fixtures
minimalist_zen.lighting: Soft warm LED lights, simple pendant, natural window light

gothic_dramatic.walls: Deep burgundy, charcoal, or black velvet walls with ornate details
